content: WordPerfect is available with the Corel WordPerfect office suite, which is similar to Microsoft Office. You can use the WordPerfect word processor in home, academic, and business environments to author various documents, such as reports, letters, invitations, resumes, flyers, and newsletters.

While the proprietary Corel WPD document format is the main file type associated with WordPerfect, WPT templates are a helpful format when you want to re-use a document to create other documents with a similar layout or content. Examples of commonly used templates include company letterheads, business memos, legal forms, and mailing envelopes.

description: A WPT file is a text document template created by Corel WordPerfect, a word processor for Windows. It contains a pre-formatted document that may include text, drawn objects, charts, tables, and images. The primary purpose of WPT files is to allow users to quickly create multiple WordPerfect (.WPD) documents with similar content and appearance.

instructions: You can open WPT files with Corel WordPerfect in Windows. The application is included with the Corel WordPerfect Office suite, along with the Quattro Pro and Presentations programs.
To open a WPT file with WordPerfect, select File → Open.... You can also select File → New Template... to open WPT files packaged with WordPerfect.
